attributes.action: make the energy company's reduce the price of central heating oil for rural areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: or to give pensioners and disabled people vouchers towards the sky high cost of heating oil . in the last 18 months heating oil has gone up from 16 pence per litre to 45 pence per litre and the energy company's are making dispicable profits. Onece again we will see elderly people dying of the cold.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
